summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing confidential information related to pricing. The email emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing confidential pricing information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is communicating with Jes Staley regarding confidential information.

keyFacts: The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
The email discusses pricing information, described as 'goofy prices'.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email includes a request for confidential treatment by JPMorgan Chase.
